I demand a recount of those votes!$3"/pause 200/shake Demetrius 200/emote Demetrius 16 true/pause 125/faceDirection GuntherSilvian 1 true/pause 100/shake Caroline 200/emote Caroline 16 true/pause 100/showFrame Lewis 0 true/pause 125/move Marnie 0 -1 3/emote Marnie 16 true/pause 100/emote Harvey 16 true/pause 225/faceDirection Sophia 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection Sophia 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Victor 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Gus 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Willy 0 true/emote Gus 16 true/pause 150/emote Demetrius 16 true/pause 250/speak Morris "...$2"/pause 400/move GuntherSilvian 2 0 1/move GuntherSilvian 0 0 2/speak Gunther "Although it was close, the results are clear as a polished gem stone, Mr. Williams.$5"/pause 200/speak Abigail "But... what will happen to our store?$2"/pause 300/faceDirection Caroline 2 true/pause 200/speak Caroline "I don't know, sweetie...$2"/pause 500/textAboveHead George "What's all this ruckus!?"/shake George 400/pause 500/faceDirection Evelyn 3 true/pause 500/shake Pierre 500/pause 400/speak Pierre "Morris! You and your Joja cronies will ruin our community!$3"/speak Morris "Everyone, I assure you that-$2"/pause 150/faceDirection Caroline 3 true/pause 100/faceDirection Evelyn 0 true/speak Pierre "No! I won't hear any of this!$3"/move Lewis 0 1 2/speak Lewis "Pierre. Allow Morris to get a word in.$0"/speak Pierre "...$4"/pause 1250/speak Pierre "Fine.$2#$b#But don't expect to win me or my family over, Morris.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Pierre 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection Pierre 2 true/pause 350/move Pierre 0 1 2/move Pierre 0 0 1/pause 150/faceDirection Pierre 0 true/pause 200/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Marnie 2 true/pause 200/move Marnie 0 1 2/pause 75/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/pause 150/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/pause 100/move GuntherSilvian -3 0 2/pause 750/speed Morris 1/move Morris 0 1 2/pause 750/showFrame Morris 28 true/pause 600/showFrame Morris 29 true/pause 75/playSound dwop/pause 500/showFrame Morris 30/pause 1000/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 200/speak Morris "When I established Joja Mart in Pelican Town, under the direction of the Governor, my goals were nothing short of self-serving.$8#$b#My only desire was to work myself up in the ranks of Joja Co., and live an affluent life in the city.$8#$b#But since rebuilding Stardew Valley's infrastructure, making new friendships, and spending the majority of my time in this thriving town...$7#$b#I've come to realize how important community is.$7#$b#I'm not asking for forgiveness... but a second chance to prove I can be better.$7"/pause 750/shake Morris 500/pause 250/speak Morris "I'm through with putting profits over people...$7#$b#I've found a new purpose! And that is improving the lives of all of you, and presenting opportunity!$8#$b#Starting with several major announcements!...$9"/pause 1000/speak Morris "Pierre! Get up here!$9"/pause 400/emote Pierre 40 true/pause 250/faceDirection Caroline 3 true/pause 400/move Pierre 0 -1 0/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/pause 500
